archimate:Node.name: Domain Gateway
archimate:Node.documentation:
This clustered node is a collection of software capabilities identified within integration tool or cloud native agent. Event hub handles the large volumes of event streaming from manufacturing plants. Please refer the Garnter's magic quadrant for Enterprise Integration Platform as a Service(ref: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-named-a-leader-in-2023-gartner-magic-quadrant-for-integration-platform-as-a-service-worldwide/).
IoT Hub: Internet of things hub enables bidirectional communication, this act as central hub that enables secure, reliable and scalable communication between IoT Hub / plant and analytic dashboard. Event Hub: Big data stream from plant domain, it can ingest , transform, persist large payload of data set in realtime for predictive and realtime operational monitoring.
